snippet: Officials from the State Department answer questions about the arrest of a suspect in the attack on the compound in Benghazi on Sept. 11, 2012.
abstract: Officials from the State Department answer questions about the arrest of a suspect in the attack on the compound in Benghazi on Sept. 11, 2012.

headline.main: Live Video from State Department Briefing on Suspect Arrested in Attack on Benghazi Compound
